The pinnacle of [[Uchiha]] Fire Release techniques,<ref name="d4"/> [[chakra]] kneaded inside the body is converted into fire, and then expelled from the mouth and [[Shape Transformation|shaped]] into a literal sea of flames,<ref>''Naruto'' chapter 628, page 2</ref> which covers a wide range as well. This makes the technique extremely difficult to either avoid or contain, with it requiring the combined efforts of several [[Water Release]] users in order to extinguish the flames.

== Trivia ==
* In the Weekly Shōnen Jump publication of chapter 560, the first kanji in the word {{translation|'annihilation'|滅却|mekkyaku}} had been replaced with the visually similar {{translation|威|authority, majesty}}, which is normally pronounced as 'i' and is also found in the name of [[Kamui]].
* In ''[[Naruto to Boruto: Shinobi Striker]]'', this technique appears as a set of six enormous fireballs.
